CHAT.comment: G. STEVEN ROWE, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF MAINE, Petitioner v. NEW HAMPSHIRE MOTOR TRANSPORT ASSOCIATION, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL STERN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BETH S. BRINKMANN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DOUGLAS HALLWARD-DRIEMEIER, ON BEHALF OF UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL STERN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:05 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
